verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Alleluia! O how the angels sang! newline Alleluia! How it rang! newline And the sky was bright with a holy light, newline 'Twas the birthday of a King.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: In the little village of Bethlehem, newline There lay a Child one day; newline And the sky was bright with a holy light, newline O'er the place where Jesus lay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 'Twas a humble birthplace, newline But oh, how much God gave to us that day; newline From the manger bed what a path has led, newline What a perfect holy way. newline Miscellaneous 1 newline (ENDING) newline O come, let us adore Him; newline O come, let us adore Him, newline Christ, the Lord. newline 'Twas the birthday of a Savior. newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline 'Twas the birthday of a King.
